successes.title: When You Find Your Purpose, You Can Do Anything!
successes.description: Find your path to a better life while spreading the message of purpose to people all over the world!

Pledges.description: Our digital package.  This includes the OFFICIAL ABE MOVIE POSTER (digital version), the ABE Movie transcript, and an ABE digital wallpaper.  IN ADDITION, send us a photo of you, and we will include it on a special digital KICKSTARTER-ONLY A Billion Entrepreneurs digital poster to be delivered to all backers shortly after the campaign ends!
Everything above, PLUS, an HD digital download of the full A Billion Entrepreneurs documentary film when it becomes available.
Everything above, PLUS, an HD digital download of the full A Billion Entrepreneurs documentary film when it becomes available.
Everything above, PLUS a physical DVD when it becomes available.
Everything above, PLUS a Limited Edition DVD with bonus extras including a behind the scenes interview with the filmmaker and full interviews of main cast.
Everything above, PLUS, a 15 MINUTE SKYPE INTERVIEW with the filmmaker.  You can ask him about making the film, building his campaign or using video in your business.

NYC PRIVATE SCREENING
Attend an intimate and memorable viewing experience of A Billion Entrepreneurs - The Movie before it is released in the theater and attend a Q and A and post-reception with Director Jimmy Newson and select cast.  digital download and transcript.

Attend an intimate and memorable viewing experience of A Billion Entrepreneurs - The Movie before it is released in the theater and attend a Q and A and post-reception with Director Jimmy Newson and select cast. digital download and transcript.

INVESTOR LEVEL.  Everything above, PLUS, we will donate in your name an ABE toolkit program to a school or organization of your choice which will include lesson plans and online video training series based on the ABE foundational principles of entrepreneurship.

NYC PREMIERE AND AFTER-PARTY:  Two VIP Tickets to the NYC PREMIERE and the after party which will be attended by Cast and Crew plus ALL the downloads and digital copies of all the photos taken that night! (transportation and hotel costs not included; date TBA, no refunds for conflicts)

DALLAS PREMIERE AND AFTER-PARTY:  Two VIP Tickets to the DALLAS Premiere and the after party which will be attended by Cast and Crew plus ALL the downloads and digital copies of all the photos taken that night! (transportation and hotel costs not included; date TBA, no refunds for conflicts)
Everything above PLUS your name on the big screen! And your name will be listed on the film web site under Friends Of A Billion Entrepreneurs Foundation.
